Name: Simpel
Review Text: Lovely intimate restaurant with great food! Their menu is diverse enough, especially with their bites & starters, even though there's only three main/big courses.The owner was very friendly. The lady however came across a bit grumpy; maybe she wasn't having her day? For the rest I can definitely recommend!

Name: Simpel
Review Text: We heard of Simpel via a colleague who had an amazing meal the evening prior.  Walking in it's smaller than the photos suggest, but big in character and charm.  The service and ambiance was comfortable and fantastic.  We dressed up, but one …

Name: Simpel
Review Text: Absolutely fantastic restaurant! Great service, lovely decor, absolutely amazing food. I had the prawn bisque and the chuck steak. Loads of flavour. I will definitely be back. Reasonably priced too.

Name: Simpel
Review Text: Beware of this one. I suspect earlier reviews were about another restaurant altogether. Uninspired food of below average quality (dry tuna, sad soppy supposedly roasted vegetables, undercooked chips), some of it actually badly tasting …

Name: Simpel
Review Text:
The food was simply delicious. I ordered Confit De Canard, and I can say this is the best duck confit I've ever had.
The only problem is the restaurant has a small space, including their sitting arrangement. The table was really small.

Name: Simpel
Review Text: Amazing food, good wine at great atmosphere. We arrived just as the kitchen was closing, but were treated to a great three courses, the scallops in particular were zoooo lekker. Staff were brilliant and fun!

Name: Simpel
Review Text: Great food. Quality ingredients, cooked well and cleanly plated. We had the 5 course menu.

Name: Simpel
Review Text:
Excellent food and very nice service. I recommend the four-course-meal.
The location is great and the prices are reasonable.

Name: Simpel
Review Text: Tasty food and cozy atmosphere, but the staff was not welcoming or polite. Not a place I would really go back to.

Name: Simpel
Review Text: Really nice international food, suited best for small groups or a date

Name: Simpel
Review Text: Poor and slow service, mediocre food and unreasonably small portions
